celine4.name: Céline
celine4.title: Love's Aroma
celine4.description: Princess of Firene. Expresses friendliness through flowers and presents given with deep affection. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: I chose these sweets while thinking of whom I would give them to. One day, I'd like to make them by hand...
In my homeland, we also give flowers to others to express our gratitude. I'd like the people to see Askr's flowers.
I mixed a single four-leaf clover into a bouquet for my brother. I'm sure he'll appreciate this gift of good fortune.
A tea that tastes like love... Don't they all, as long as they're brewed with passion?
Diplomacy means acting friendly. But still, I will draw my sword on anyone who scatters my country's flowers.
Visit: These Day of Devotion flowers were chosen especially for you by [F].
Level: The flowers of love bloom within my heart! Let's be sure to make it home alive.
This power is meant for happiness. I will show no mercy to those who disrupt this festival.
I thought I learned all I needed to enjoy the festival... But there is more.
Summon: I am Céline, princess of Firene. I'm happy to take part in the Day of Devotion. I thank you profusely.
Learn Skill: Thank you for your love. You will have mine with victory!
Confession:
Come this way, [S].
I've prepared flowers and tea to show my appreciation for you.
It sure is peaceful... I'd like to have this kind of peace with my enemies and actually be able to talk to them.
Wars only happen because people are unsatisfied. We look down on others because we're unhappy.
It is sad, but I believe it's the truth...
Eh...you're right. I do get irritable when I'm hungry. Perhaps it's as simple as that.
If that's the case, don't you think we could prevent a few wars by satisfying our enemy's hunger?
I know... It's childish idealism. Still, if you just smile and nod along, it doesn't seem so bad, does it?
Status: This is the traditional attire of the kingdom of Firene.
Oh, I was thinking I could hide a sword there, but it looks like you spotted it easily.
All the flowers and gifts brimming with thanks... The mere sight is enough to make me giddy with delight!
Do you suppose serving tea is an acceptable way to show appreciation at this festival?
I am unsure about the bouquet for my brother. Do you think I should put some training weights inside?
I would like to let Chloé and Louis know how grateful I am to them. Though it is a bit awkward to simply say it.
I don't yet know the best way to express my fondness, but someday I'd like to give you a bouquet of flowers from my home.

hortensia3.name: Hortensia
hortensia3.title: Cutesplosion
hortensia3.description: Second princess of Elusia. Dons modest, ladylike garb and imparts her gratitude to those she loves. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: I prefer my dresses short and cute! Although as I get older, I might learn to appreciate the longer ones more.
In Elusia, I saw more snowflakes than flowers. You can't make a bouquet of them, but they really are pretty!
I think I've chosen a wonderful gift full of love for my sister. But...now I'm anxious about giving it to her!
You can't spread too much love and cuteness! I'm usually on the receiving end, so it's my turn to give back.
When I think of giving a gift, my late father still comes to mind. I think it's all right to prepare something for him.
Visit: You are quite fortunate to be the recipient of these heartfelt greetings from [F]!
Level: Earning someone's love is important. But loving yourself is important too! That's the truth!
This is the perfect amount of love for me! I'll return it a hundredfold!
I'm looking for more love. Let's get going, right after I polish up on my strength and cuteness!
Summon: Hortensia reporting for the Day of Devotion! I give my sincere love to you and everyone here!
Learn Skill: Is this a token of your affection? How wonderful! Thank you! I will keep getting better!
Confession:
Oh, Summoner! I just witnessed the sweetest scene between two Hero lovebirds sharing their feelings.
I guess I thought the Day of Devotion was kind of philanthropic...all about spreading love to a lot of people.
But maybe expressing deep love to one person in your heart is actually closer to the true essence of this day.
Who would I share my feelings with? Maybe the Divine Dragon? Hmm... And Ivy, and my retainers...
Oh! The Emblems too, and all my friends... Ugh, I love them all! Huh? That's why people like me?
Thank you! Wait right here! I'm going to get you a bouquet to express my love for you too!
Status: Have some love!
Thanks a lot!
I'm not used to long dresses like this, but it really makes me look grown up. Isn't it great?
I picked this bouquet for maximum cuteness. I wonder if my sister will like it?
I always thank people when I get the chance. It's too late when they're gone.
Rosado, Goldmary...thank you for...umm... Wow. Even just practicing this is embarrassing.
The academy I went to had an event like this too. I never took part there, but I'm really liking it.

louis.name: Louis
louis.title: Petal Knight
louis.description: Royal knight of Firene and retainer to Princess Céline. Finds utmost joy in seeing his friends happy. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: What a beautiful sight... Friends sharing feelings with one another... And even you mingling amidst them.
My three younger brothers would surely be delighted if I sent them flowers or sweets from Askr.
Enjoy this tea with the aroma of a red fruit. It, like this festival, offers a feeling of love. Do drink while it's hot.
I heard that a pair of Heroes in this world cannot be separated. I would love to see this. Will you show me?
All flowers suit Princess Céline, so making her bouquet was a true joy. Shall I make one for you next?
Visit: I have come to convey my love and to say that I will watch over you and [F]forever.
Level: The combination of me and the Day of Devotion is a truly magnificent sight!
It is such an uplifting feeling to see a scene brimming with love. It gives me strength.
I became so absorbed in the festivities that it seems I have neglected my duties.
Summon: I am Louis, a royal knight of Firene. The Day of Devotion is a splendid affair. I feel a new opportunity ahead.
Learn Skill: Thank you for extending your love to me. But please, you must give your love to the other Heroes as well...
Confession:
Ahh... People giving thanks to their retainers with candy... And neighbors giving bouquets to those they love...
Ah, I am glad to see you made it here, [S]!
I have been waiting just for you. It is not as though my sole purpose here is watching other Heroes.
Please, accept this Day of Devotion gift from me. I have made some traditional baked goods from Firene.
Why not stay awhile? I will make tea. I am sure there are others who would like to express their feelings to you.
This, I would love to see... Numerous Heroes in Askr giving gifts of love to the summoner...
Status: This is a wonderful festival. I am grateful you summoned me.
What?! A princess of another world is shyly presenting a gift to a friend of hers? It is wonderful to be surrounded by so much love.
When selecting a Day of Devotion gift, one considers the recipient wholeheartedly, is that right? I like how thoughtful that is.
While I am fond of grapes, I have no love for the seaweed known as sea grapes.
This bouquet is for Princess Céline, though it would set a far more picturesque scene if Chloé were to give it to her.
*contented sigh* The sight of everyone giving a gift to their beloved... I find it quite uplifting.
I shall brew some tea to express my gratitude. I hope you enjoy the infused aroma of flowers from Firene in this blend.

veyle4.name: Veyle
veyle4.title: Sister Dragons
veyle4.description: Dragon siblings, once torn apart, who now reunite at Askr's Day of Devotion. They appear in Fire Emblem Engage.
veyle4.duo:
Grants【Divinely Inspiring】,【Reflex】, and "unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat" to unit and allies within 3 spaces of unit for 1 turn.
(Duo Skills can be used once per map by tapping the Duo button. Duo Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
(When unit has a status or a skill that enables use of a
Style
, Duo Skills and Harmonized Skills cannot be used while unit can take an action (those skills can be used after unit has acted).)
【Divinely Inspiring】
Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = X × 3 (X = number of allies with the Divinely Inspiring effect within 3 spaces of unit, excluding unit; max 2), grants Special cooldown count-X to unit before foe's first attack, and when unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores X × 4 HP to unit during combat.
【Reflex】
Reduces damage from foe's first attack by 7 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes) and unit's next attack deals damage = total damage reduced from foe's first attack (by any source, including other skills; resets at end of combat). (For 1 turn.)

Castle Hall: **Veyle:** It's nice to attend a festival as a family... I wonder if Mama and Papa ever expressed their love like this...
**Alear:** Veyle is always so reserved... But it's nice to see her having fun. I'm going to spoil her silly today!
**Veyle:** Being here, I feel warm inside. Seeing humans and dragons together like this...makes me believe in love.
**Alear:** I would like to find flowers befitting Emblems to express my gratitude to them. For Marth, maybe...bright blue?
**Veyle:** Although we are Fell and Divine Dragons, we have an unbreakable bond. I wish to stay together forever.
Visit: **Veyle:** So sorry to intrude, but we come to you with greetings from [F].
Level: **Veyle:** Because everyone has accepted me, I can live as a righteous dragon.
**Veyle:** Is great power not suitable for the Day of Devotion?
Summon: I am Veyle. I am here at the Day of Devotion festival with my sister, Alear. Please, accept our gratitude.
Learn Skill: **Veyle:** With your devotion, I won't be outdone! Just watch!
Confession:
**Veyle:** I've never seen flowers like this in Elyos, but this world is full of them. Being in a garden is like a dream.
**Alear:** It was in a field of flowers that we first met, Veyle. You helped me after the battle in Florra Mill Town.
**Veyle:** Yes. It seems so long ago, back when I was all alone. But now I'm so happy we can be together.
**Alear:** So am I. Thank you so much for fighting with me in Elyos and searching for me.
**Veyle:** It is I who should thank you. Hehe... It is a little embarrassing to express so much, but maybe today it's OK...
**Alear:** Yes. And every day from now on, I'll express my gratitude and love to you. For thousands of years to come.
**Veyle:** And I will do the same. I will show all the feelings I couldn't for the thousands of years we were apart...
Status: "Sister, will you engage with me at the festival today?" "*giggle* Of course I will, Veyle."
Conversation: **Veyle:** Festivals are so fun, aren't they? Seeing all the smiles makes me happy.
**Alear:** Being able to convey our love to one another is truly a blessing. Thank you for everything, Little Sister.
**Veyle:** It's you who deserves the thanks. When I think back, I'm always receiving valuable things from you...
Like the dragonstone you gave me when I was little... It helped me endure many hardships.
**Alear:** I'm proud to know that the Alear of the past gave you such a good gift.
**Veyle:** I wonder if I could ever give someone such a fulfilling gift...
**Alear:** Of course you can. Besides, any gift from you will bring happiness.
**Veyle:** I hope you're right. But when it comes to picking one out, I have no idea...
**Alear:** Flowers are the popular choice at these festivals. But I've heard of people giving sweets too.
**Veyle:** You mean like...chocolate? Or cake? I do recall people eating those kinds of things in the Somniel...
But I don't like sweets at all... How will I know what's tasty or not?
**Alear:** You could always give something that's not sweet. It's best to go with what you consider good.
**Veyle:** Oh... Well then I should offer my favorite. It's extra spicy and delicious!
It's caked in bright-red seasoning, and when you bite into it, an exciting sauce gushes out.
**Alear:** Oh, that sounds...interesting. It would be good for someone with a stomach for spicy food.
**Veyle:** But I really want it to please you! I'll think more about it. I'm going to go check out that shop over there...
**Alear:** Please me with a gift? Heh. Oh, Veyle, just hearing you say that fills my heart...
